oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Proceedings of the Workshop on Organic Public Catering at the 16th IFOAM Organic World Congress, 19th June 2008 in Modena, Italy
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
Food security, food quality and human health
Food systems
Markets and trade
Consumer issues
Produce chain management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This proceedings shows the papers and/or power point slides of presentations held during a workshop included in the OWC about how to include organic food in school meals in various countries in Europe and Asia. the workshop was arranged by the iPOPY project (more at www.ipopy.coreportal.org).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Strassner, Carola; Løes, Anne-Kristin; Kristensen, Niels Heine and Spigarolo, Roberto (Eds.) (2009) Proceedings of the Workshop on Organic Public Catering at the 16th IFOAM Organic World Congress, 19th June 2008 in Modena, Italy. ICROFS, Denmark, Core Organic Project Series Report. Proceedings of Workshop on Organic Public Catering at the 16th IFOAM Organic World Congress, Modena, Italy, June 19, 2008.
